translations: 潜艇；潜水艇（submarine 的复数）

phrs.translation: 海底扇；海底陆源沉积扇；海底扇形地
潜入式浇口；潜伏浇口；下浇口

sentences.sentence: He had a fascination for submarines and joined this branch of the service.
sentences.translation: 他迷恋潜艇并加入了海军的这个分支。

sentences.sentence: Ask anyone who has ever served on one. They'll tell you there are only two types of ships in the world: submarines and targets.
sentences.translation: 去问任何曾经服过兵役的人吧。他们会告诉你世界上只有两种船：潜艇和目标。

sentences.sentence: After this technique had been invented, it was only a matter of time before weapons designers adapted it for the detection of submarines.
sentences.translation: "这项技术被发明之后，武器设计者将其改造用来探测潜艇只是时间早晚的问题。
